articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: There is indignation in France after the principal at a Paris school quit because of fears for his life.
articles.title: French school head resigns over Paris veil row and death threats

articles.description: Tyler 'Ninja' Blevins is the most-followed streamer in the world, with 19m followers on Twitch.
articles.title: Ninja: Twitch's biggest gamer shares cancer diagnosis

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: UK passports can have up to 10 years and nine months on them but EU countries won't accept them.
articles.title: Holidaymakers going to EU caught out by 10-year-passport rule

articles.description: The two sides have been fighting over who gets control of Disney's Florida theme park resort.
articles.title: Disney and DeSantis allies end legal dispute over control of theme park

articles.description: Kim Avis faked his own death and went on the run but was eventually tracked down and convicted of rape.
articles.title: The women behind a fugitive rapist's downfall

articles.description: The former US Senator was Al Gore's running mate in the 2000 presidential election
articles.title: Joe Lieberman, former vice presidential candidate, dies at 82

articles.description: Fans have long debated if the floating panel, that kept Rose afloat, was big enough for Jack too.
articles.title: Titanic 'door' prop that kept Rose alive sells for $718,750

articles.description: Spain's ex-football boss could go to prison because of a non-consensual kiss at the Women's World Cup.

articles.description: Every kind of gun is flooding into Port-au-Prince. Haitians are blaming the US.
articles.title: Haiti: US guns pour into Port-au-Prince, fuelling surge in violence

articles.description: A wildlife rescue was handed the ornamental tuft by a well-intentioned rescuer.
articles.title: Rescued baby hedgehog turns out to be hat bobble
